description_txt: stated on June 3, 2014 in a radio ad:
quote_txt: "Sen. McConnell says it's not his job to bring jobs to Kentucky."

description_txt: stated on March 24, 2014 in in an interview at gun shop in Hudson, N.H.:
quote_txt: Says when armed civilians stop mass shootings with guns, an average of 2.5 people die; otherwise, an average of 18 people die.

description_txt: stated on May 28, 2014 in remarks at a gathering:
quote_txt: Four (maybe five) Latinos have served on the Austin City Council.

description_txt: stated on June 2, 2014 in a press release:
quote_txt: "Congresswoman Ros-Lehtinen has long record of voting against VA backlog fixes."

description_txt: stated on May 27, 2014 in WABE:
quote_txt: "We’ve got an average of 5,600 soldiers committing suicide. That’s about 20 a day."

description_txt: stated on June 3, 2014 in comments on "The Rachel Maddow Show":
quote_txt: "The Pentagon made up" the since-debunked heroics of POW Jessica Lynch as she tried to avoid capture in Iraq.

description_txt: stated on June 5, 2014 in emails circulating on the Internet:
quote_txt: Due to actions by President Barack Obama, "the Burger King national headquarters announced this month that they will be pulling their franchises from our military bases."

description_txt: stated on June 2, 2014 in a commentary:
quote_txt: "Public display of a long rifle is perfectly legal in Texas."

description_txt: stated on June 5, 2014 in posts on Facebook:
quote_txt: Says Michele Bachmann said on Fox News, "This country could use a president like Benjamin Franklin again."

description_txt: stated on May 5, 2014 in remarks at a forum:
quote_txt: Medicare is "going broke. The trust fund goes bankrupt in 2026."

description_txt: stated on May 15, 2014 in a website statement:
quote_txt: "Marijuana is less addictive than both alcohol and tobacco."

description_txt: stated on June 1, 2014 in an appearance on "Fox News Sunday":
quote_txt: Says Hillary Clinton "laid the groundwork" for getting chemical weapons out of Syria.

description_txt: stated on June 2, 2014 in a campaign commercial:
quote_txt: "Charlie Crist allowed college tuition to increase up to 15 percent every year."

description_txt: stated on May 26, 2014 in a segment on "Outnumbered":
quote_txt: Redskins is "used historically" as "a term of respect."

description_txt: stated on May 8, 2014 in an interview:
quote_txt: "This generation, on average, is starting their careers, if they’ve been to a four-year college, with just under $30,000 in debt."

description_txt: stated on May 19, 2014 in statement:
quote_txt: "The numbers make it clear that Georgia voters are increasingly taking advantage of early voting opportunities."

description_txt: stated on June 3, 2014 in in comments on "Real Time with Bill Maher":
quote_txt: "We’ve seen a remarkable reduction in the number of Americans being executed -- it’s down nearly two-thirds over the past generation."

description_txt: stated on May 23, 2014 in in comments on "Real Time with Bill Maher":
quote_txt: "We're fifth in the world (in executions), behind China, Iran, Iraq and Saudi Arabia."

description_txt: stated on June 1, 2014 in an interview on CBS' "Face the Nation":
quote_txt: The five Taliban detainees being released from Guantanamo in exchange for captured Army Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl "are the hardest of the hard-core. These are the highest high-risk people."

description_txt: stated on June 2, 2014 in a post on his website:
quote_txt: New carbon regulations will increase electric bills by "$17 billion every year" and "potentially put an average of 224,000 more people out of work every year."

description_txt: stated on May 28, 2014 in an interview on MSNBC:
quote_txt: "Qataris don't really work."

description_txt: stated on May 27, 2014 in a news release:

description_txt: stated on May 16, 2014 in a flier:

description_txt: stated on April 30, 2014 in a news release:

description_txt: stated on June 1, 2014 in comments on "Fox News Sunday":
quote_txt: Says Hillary Clinton "defended Syria’s President Assad as a possible reformer at the start of that country’s civil war."

description_txt: stated on June 1, 2014 in comments on ABC's "This Week":
quote_txt: Says Barack Obama broke a decades-old policy of "not negotiating with terrorists."

description_txt: stated on April 30, 2014 in a campaign website:

description_txt: stated on May 14, 2014 in a video ad:
